body.p:
Full testing of map generation will require the following test cases:
Initial paragraph that generates a map with no title, no submaps
Initial paragraph that generates a map with a title, no submaps
Initial paragraph that generates a map with a title, paragraphs that generate submaps
Initial paragraph that generates a map with a title, paragraphs that generate topicrefs within a containerType (e.g., a topicgroup), no submaps
Initial paragraph that generates a map with a title, paragraphs that generate topicrefs within a containerType (e.g., a topicgroup), submaps
Maps and one level of submaps with titles everywhere:
body.codeblock: Level 0: Title -> map, map title, topicref, topic doc, topic title Level 1: Normal: Normal para that should be content of level-0 topic Level 1: Heading 1 -> mapref, map doc, map title, topicref, topic doc, topic title Level 2: Heading 2 -> topicref, topic doc, topic title
